text:
Hi Will, sorry for a delayed reply. It's been a bit busy in the recent days. How are you? 
I'm most likely will be able to reply in bursts.

So a bit about myself - I've been in the industry for around 8-9 years now. I started as a generalist/modeler then slowly transitioned into lighting/lookdev. I had opportunity to be a lead as well as supervise some projects in the recent years. I mostly worked in films but I had some great time working on game cinematics/high end commercials too. At the moment I do lighting and lookdev at Framestore and I'll be happy to answer all your questions and provide you with feedback if you'll need any.
